messages.subject: Re: PMK Fanfic+Fanart Contest
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I submitted both the PMK Saitou and PMK Hijikata under the name secretarytocapt3.  The webmaster even used secretarytocapt3 next to both images, when
messages.messageBody:
Well, I submitted both the PMK Saitou and PMK Hijikata under the name
secretarytocapt3. The webmaster even used "secretarytocapt3" next to
both images, when they were displayed on the site...so that's why I
don't understand why they decided to change my name ^_^ now.
I'm hoping that its just a typo or something.

Barbara you have poor eyesight? Does this mean you have to zoom in on
eyecandy! LOL!

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] PMK Fanfic+Fanart Contest
messages.msgSnippet: ... But why not???  Because they think you copied it? I don t see how *anyone* could think your work is copied/traced.  Your drawings are so distinctive, so
messages.messageBody:
secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:

>>Lastly, I'm also not getting any of the prizes offered either.<<

But why not??? Because they think you copied it? I don't see how *anyone* could think your work is copied/traced. Your drawings are so distinctive, so full of energy... (BTW, I *love* your Hijikata... I just saw it... magnificent!)

phil (in disbelief)

messages.subject: PMK Fanfic+Fanart Contest
messages.msgSnippet: http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/index.html will be announcing the winners of the fanfic portion of the contest soon...but I would also like to
messages.messageBody:
http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/index.html
will be announcing the winners of the fanfic portion of the contest
soon...but I would also like to mention that on...
http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/contestinfo.html
The winners of the Fanart part of the contest are...
1st place~Kurot
2nd~Secretary Copy Cat
3rd~ S-girl

the images are all offline now so we can't see Kurot's work but I'm
sure we all recall S-girl's pic of Hijikata and Ayunee...now if you
will notice I'm called "Secretary Copy Cat" for my rendition of PMK
Saitou (which is in the PHOTOS section)...I hope its a *joke* (I did
email the site owners right away to get an explanation) but I don't
copy/trace stuff...I just stared at the scanlations of PMK Saitou
for a long time while I was eating dinner and came up with a pose
after surfing the net for iaido poses and in my drawing PMK Saitou's
left arm is completely wrong (his elbow shouldn't be that low---it
should be "out"). In any case, I'm no artist but I would never
descend to the level of tracing a manga and say that its my work.
Lastly, I'm also not getting any of the prizes offered either.

Secretarytocapt3
http://www.shinsengumimb.com
*a bit perplexed---will have to look over pics of Jo Odagiri to feel
better now*
